description: An organ that allows a mature Gracken to convert their arms back to a base state.

use_action.description: You graft this organ onto your body replacing whatever was there before.

effect.u_message: You exchanged your previous arms for this.

false_effect.u_message: You are already have Gracken arms.

description: An organ that allows a mature Gracken to convert their arms to a stronger form.

use_action.description: You graft this organ onto your body replacing whatever was there before.

effect.u_message: You exchanged your previous arms for this.

false_effect.u_message: You are already have strong arms.

description: An organ that allows a mature Gracken to convert their arms to a longer form.

use_action.description: You graft this organ onto your body replacing whatever was there before.

effect.u_message: You exchanged your previous arms for this.

false_effect.u_message: You are already have long arms.

description: An organ that allows a mature Gracken to convert their eyes into a mystical tool powered by an Earth cryptid.

use_action.description: You graft this organ onto your body replacing whatever was there before.

effect.u_message: You exchanged your previous eyes for this.

false_effect.u_message: You are already have Seven O'clock Eyes.

use_action.description: You graft this organ onto your body replacing whatever was there before.
